comments:
Steps to reproduce

1. Start fresh workspace
2. Define Tomcat 5.5 or other webapp capable runtime
3. Create "war" Web project
4. Create "util" Utility project
5. Open "war" project properties, go to Web libraries page, select "util" and
press ok

Problem: "internal error" dialog pops up and the following exceptions is logged
to the console (nothing in .log!).

This could be the same problem as described in bug 115313. WTP I20051105, IBM
JDK j9n142-20050929, WinXP SP2.
